title: Embalming lake
name: embalming_lake
description:
A high ceiling underground lake with a glowing bed which lights up the water, surrounded by tall stalactite. There is a large embalming hand [1] located in the middle, where most adventurers begin their journey. 
 A group of goblins were seen mounted near upper walls of the lake with a large artilary.
allegiance: Way of the hand, seized over by communion of light
